videos.headline: Drake London makes two amazing catches on USC TD drive
videos.description: Drake London goes airborne to haul in a remarkable 28-yard reception, then makes a one-handed catch for a touchdown.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Drake London makes two amazing catches on USC TD drive) 2021/10/02 ESHEET

videos.headline: USC's Michael Trigg makes leaping catch for 46-yard TD
videos.description: Michael Trigg outjumps his defender to haul in a pass from Kedon Slovis and takes it in for a 46-yard touchdown.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Michael Trigg makes catch for 46-yard Receiving touchdown) 2021/10/02 ESHEET
